title: Last pile of T206 Needs...P thru Z
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Last pile of T206 Needs...P thru Z
posts.post_content:
Hi Folks,

My first two postings for middling condition raw T206 commons produced four completed transactions for 8 cards. Below please find my needs for P thru Z. PM me please if you have anything on this, or my A thru F post (which is floundering on the second page as I type this) or my H thru O post (falling off of the first page as I type) that you want to sell. Thanks in advance to any who may respond.:) Please, help me take a bite out of the Monster.:D

What I need for P thru Z is:


370. Jim Pastorius
380. Jake Pfeister (Pfiester) (Throwing)
381. Jimmy Phelan
384. Ollie Pickering
387. Jack Powell
391. Lee Quillen (Quillin)
396. Ed Reulbach (Glove Showing)
402. Claude Ritchey
406. Nap Rucker (Portrait)
410. Germany Schaefer (Detroit)
411. Germany Schaefer (Washington)
414. Admiral Schlei (Batting)
420. Wildfire Schulte (Front View)
422. Jim Scott Got 'em Thanks Doug
428. Bud Sharpe
431. Hunky Shaw (Providence)
437. Frank Smith (Chicago F. Smith On Front)
438bv. Frank Smith (Chicago & Boston)
443. Fred Snodgrass (Catching)
448. Jake Stahl (No Glove Shows) Got 'em from the 'Bay of all places
451. Charlie Starr
452. Harry Steinfeldt (Portrait)
455. George Stone
456. George Stovall (Batting)
463. Bill Sweeney (Boston)
464. Jeff Sweeney (New York)
466. Lee Tannehill (Chicago L. Tannehill On Front)
469. Fred Tenney
484. Heinie Wagner (Bat On Left Shoulder)
493. Doc White (Chicago Pitching)
496. Jack White (Buffalo)
497. Kaiser Wilhelm (Hands At Chest)
498. Kaiser Wilhelm (With Bat)
500. Ed Willetts (Willett)
505. Owen Wilson
507. Hooks Wiltse (Portrait No Cap)
513. Irv Young (Minneapolis)
514. Heinie Zimmermann

We have the following lists so far:

A - C

D - F

H - O

P - Z

Does that me we can look forward to a G-String, Oops, I mean a G-Thread?:eek:

Marketing Genius, Mike, keep 'em in their seats til the last out in the bottom of the ninth.:D:D:D
